data.prayer: Father, encourage the 11,112 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Veszprém, Hungary
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Veszprém, Hungary, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 32 lost neighbors

data.prayer: There are 363,700 people living in the state of Veszprém. Only about 11,112 might be believers.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Veszprém, Hungary to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Turk people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Turk people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Turk people is yours.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Veszprém.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Veszprém, Hungary. Please, stir the 11,112 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Veszprém.

location.name: Veszprém
location.people_groups_list: Arab, general, Bosniak, Chinese, general, Jew, Hungarian-speaking, Vietnamese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, general (5,200), Bosniak (19,000), Chinese, general (6,400), Jew, Hungarian-speaking (47,000), Vietnamese (3,300)
